downloadTitle: System Center 2022 Integration Pack for SharePoint
downloadDescription: The Integration Pack for SharePoint is an add-on for System Center 2022 Orchestrator that enables you to create activities within runbooks that make requests to the SharePoint to get data or perform functions.
systemRequirementsSection:
• System Center 2022 - Orchestrator
  • Microsoft SharePoint
  • Windows Server 2019 or higher
  • .NET Framework 4.0 or higher (.NET 4.7.2 recommended)
  • RAM – minimum 1GB (recommended 2GB)
  • Disk space minimum 200MB
  • CPU Dual Core or better
installInstructionSection: Download the .oip file, register the Integration Pack in Deployment Manager and then deploy the Integration Pack on Runbook Designer and Runbook Server.
